content: square will start to become a not so perfect square it is intentional and part of the design so don t panic let the star come through per side 6bpdc 4dc 1 v st per corner 2dc ch2 2dc round 6 ch2 this counts as your 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1fphdc around each of the next 5 sts chain 1 sk3 sts the 3rd st that you skip is the 1st post of the v st dc2togcl ch2 4times dc2togcl in the chain-2 space of the v st ch1 skip 3 sts the 1st st that you skip is the 2nd post of the v st 1fphdc around each of the next 5 sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2hdc ch2 2hdc 2hdc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch2 to complete the last corner can you see the star yet per side 10fphdc 5dc2tog 4 chain-2 sps 2 chain-1 sps per corner 2hdc ch2 2hdc 4 round 7 ch2 this counts as your 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1fphdc around each of the next 7 sts 1sc in the chain-1sp 1fpsc around the dc2togcl 1sc in the chain-2 space 4 times 1fpsc around the dc2togcl 1sc in the chain-1 space 1fphdc around each of the next 7 sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2hdc ch2 2hdc 2hdc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch2 to complete the last corner fasten_off your end and work away the tail if you wish you can replace the joining half_double_crochet with ch2 and use an invisible join per side 14fphdc 5fpsc 6sc per corner 2hdc ch2 2hdc round 8 join with a st-double_crochet in the fpsc of the centre dc2togcl 1 double_crochet in the same st this is half of the first new corner *1dc in each of the next 6 sts 1hdc in each of the next 2 sts 1sc in the next st ch5 skip the next 5 sts ch2 5 sts your ch5 should sit behind the skip sts 1sc in the next st 1hdc in each of the next 2 sts 1dc in each of the next 6 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in the next st this should be the fpsc of the centre dc2togcl * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into same st as your st-double_crochet and 1hdc into the top of the st-double_crochet to complete the last corner per side 12dc 4hdc 2sc 1 chain-5 space per corner 2dc ch2 2dc 5 round 9 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1dc in each of the next 3 sts do
